channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: I believe that a good social science will provide us with the answers to fundamental problems that life on earth faces in this historical colonial-modern stage. With several colleagues, we are working hard to lay the foundations of an interdisciplinary social sciences research center in Latin America. As a Social Anthropologist, I am currently finishing a PhD in Computer Science, developing the Computational Social Science area in one of the main scientific centers of the southern hemisphere.
